	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Payeer.sol#4)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Payeer.sol#60-63)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Payeer.sol#67-70)
